snippet.title: Prison Bros Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Prison Bros is a 2D pixel stealth game that my team and I had designed in Unity. Help Damian break his best friend, Don, out of prison while avoiding the security guards and cameras. You can find our project exclusively on itch.io.com.

localized.title: Prison Bros Gameplay Trailer
